sentence: In a letter to Mastriano, Thompson wrote, we understand that you spoke with former President Trump about your post-election activities.? CNBC Politics Read more of CNBCs politics coverage: Vote on Biden Fed picks delayed as GOP presses for answers on Raskins ties to firm Prince Andrew settles sex abuse lawsuit by Jeffrey Epstein victim Giuffre Remington to pay $73 million to families of Sandy Hook shooting victims The other subpoenas were issued to Michael Roman and Gary Michael Brown, who led Election Day operations for Trumps 2020 campaign; Michigan GOP Chair Laura Cox; and Arizona State Representative Mark Finchem.
author: Kevin Breuninger
title: House probe of Jan. 6 Capitol riot subpoenas Arizona GOP leader Kelli Ward, 5 others over alternate electors
